revised_title: Coal Liquefaction and Gasification in the Federal Republic of Germany
tldr: The article discusses the development of coal liquefaction and gasification technologies in the Federal Republic of Germany. It highlights the importance of these processes in replacing part of the shortage of oil and natural gas, and the state of development of various experimental and demonstration plants. The author also explores the potential of coal conversion for transport purposes and chemical feedstock.
scientific_discipline: Engineering and Technology > Energy and Fuels
